moves.1. e4: I joined Pauli0072's game. I checked out a few of his games quickly before.  I saw that he exposes the queen early so maybe there's a chance there.
moves.1... d5: I saw he used queen pawn open alot.
moves.2... Qxd5: Wow queen's out fourth move!  So much for development.
moves.3. Nc3 Qf5 4. Bd3 Qg5 5. Nf3: Going to get me a queen!
moves.6. Rg1 Qh3 7. Bf1 Qe6+ 8. Be2: Whew.  Now time for a bit of development.
moves.8... Nc6 9. d3 h6 10. d4 Nb4 11. Kf1: Should have gone with Pxa2 to deal with the Knight at b4
moves.12. Rg2 Bf5: That bishop is trouble with the Knight at b4 I should have moved the Rook in anticipation of Kxc2
moves.13. Ng1: But my mind was on this Ah ha!  I've got the queen trapped he's got no where to go.
moves.14. a3 Nxc2: Ugg why didn't I see this one Bf5 covers Kxc2. Can't take him with the Queen
moves.15... Nxd4: Now the Rook is exposed to the Bishop at F5 I should have moved it but...
moves.16. Nf3: Shall I take your Knight or the Queen?
moves.16... Nxf3: Niether! I goofed here and recapture his knight leaving the Rook exposed.
moves.17. Bxf3: Which he takes full advantage of...
moves.18. Nxb1: Well got a consolation bishop not very satisfying though
moves.18... Rd8 19. Qb3 Nf6 20. Qb5+: Now it's my turn! Take that!
moves.20... c6: My next move proves to be fatal instead of Qxb7, Qxc5 might have been the play.
moves.21. Qxb7: Visions of checking with Qxc6 were going through my head until....
moves.21... Qc4+: What the?... ah excuse me Paul, I was checking you.
moves.23... Qc2+ 24. Nd2: "Fear not O King, for this mighty Knight will save you!"
moves.25. Kf1: Ah I don't suppose I could get a free move here?  I didn't think so... : (
moves.27. Ke3 Rxb2+ 28. Kd3 Rxb7: Oh the unmitigated pain! I have to conceed here, stick a fork in my attack plan it's done!
